we are using EJB 2.0 on Weblogic(6.0).Does cactus works on th above details=
.as u ahev given that it is tested on weblogicv(5.1) 
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: vmassol@... 
  To: junit@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: T=
uesday, September 25, 2001 4:16 PM
  Subject: [junit] [announce] Cactus v1.=
2 is released


  The Jakarta Cactus project (http://jakarta.apache.org/cac=
tus) is 
  proud to announce the release of version 1.2. Cactus is a unit 
=
  testing framework for testing server side java code. It supports unit 
  =
testing of : 

  * Servlets, 
  * JSP Tag libraries, 
  * Servlet Filters, =

  * EJBs, 
  * JSPs 

  Please check the Features list 
  (http://jakarta.=
apache.org/cactus/features.html) and the Changelog 
  (http://jakarta.apach=
e.org/cactus/changes.html#release_changes) for 
  details on what's new.

 =
 Cactus also provides several Jakarta Ant scripts to automate unit 
  testi=
ng on your server and has been tested on the following servers : 
  Tomcat =
(v3.2, v3.3, v4.0), Resin (v1.2, v1.3, v2.0), Orion (1.4, 1.5) 
  and WebLo=
gic (v5.1). It works with all Servlet 2.2 and 2.3 compliant 
  servlet engi=
nes.

  In addition, Cactus 1 adds tight integration with HttpUnit for easy=
 
  asserting of server responses.

  Thank you
  -The Cactus Team

subscribe@yahoogroups.com

ahoo! Terms of Service.
